law.catch_line: Notwithstanding any other provision of this subtitle, for a rental vehicle as defined in § 11-148.1...
law.text:
Notwithstanding any other provision of this subtitle, for a rental vehicle as defined in § 11-148.1 of this article, the annual registration fee is:
For a Class A (passenger) vehicle with a manufacturer's shipping weight of:
3,700 pounds or less - $27.00; and
More than 3,700 pounds - $40.50;
For a Class E (truck) vehicle with a manufacturer's rated capacity of 3/4 ton or less and a maximum gross vehicle weight of 7,000 pounds or less - $33.75;
Notwithstanding item (2) of this section, for a Class E (truck) vehicle:
For a Class F (tractor) vehicle based on the maximum gross weight of the vehicle in combination with a trailer or semitrailer as follows:
For a Class G (trailer) vehicle based on the maximum gross weight as follows:
For a nonfreight trailer or semitrailer:
For a freight trailer or semitrailer - $20.25; and
For a Class M (multipurpose) vehicle with a manufacturer's shipping weight of:
3,700 pounds or less - $27.00; and
More than 3,700 pounds - $40.50.
